issue.title: png optimization(loss less)
issue.body:
Lighter png files. Image quality is not degraded.
I used WinMerge when checking the image loss less

issue.title: Update documentation to be in line with behavior
issue.body: This PR updates the javadoc of `LottieAnimationView#setRenderMode` to be in line with the [implementation](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/blob/c553ad392e62f29de7045f4e5c9ed116d951c454/lottie/src/main/java/com/airbnb/lottie/RenderMode.java#L27-L34)

issue.title: Add reverseOnRepeat option to LottieAnimatable
issue.body:
Resolves issue #2125 - `LottieAnimation Composable: support LottieAnimationView (XML) repeatMode equivalent`.

This PR adds a `reverseOnRepeat` boolean option to `LottieAnimatable` (defaults to `false`). When set to true the effect is the same as using `app:lottie_repeatMode="reverse"` in the Android XML lottie implementation.

### Example:


#### Regular Repeat:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1331002/190251017-31ca9346-f009-4b4c-bf90-c8a615778ddc.mov


#### With reverseOnRepeat=true:


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1331002/190251270-52c9bc98-8937-42a2-a84a-b1295c604e08.mov

issue.title: Support "ps" in Document Data
issue.body: Fixes #2131

issue.title: Allow decimals for precomp size
issue.body: Fixes #2121

issue.title: Update README.md
issue.body: Requesting for Pull Request

issue.title: Fix ImageAssetManager.bitmapForId NPE crash
issue.body: In Android docs, BitmapFactory.decodeStream may return NULL, This is a legal return value, we did not deal with it, NPE may occur in some cases. So I fixed it.

issue.title: Fix ImageAssetManager.bitmapForId NPE crash
issue.body: In Android docs, BitmapFactory.decodeStream may return NULL, This is a legal return value, we did not deal with it, NPE may occur in some cases. So I fixed it.

issue.body: In Android docs, BitmapFactory.decodeStream may return NULL, This is a legal return value, we did not deal with it, NPE may occur in some cases. So I fixed it.

issue.title: Fix ImageAssetManager.bitmapForId NPE crash
issue.body: In Android docs, BitmapFactory.decodeStream may return NULL, This is a legal return value, we did not deal with it, NPE may occur in some cases. So I fixed it.

issue.title: Fix ImageAssetManager.bitmapForId NPE crash
issue.body: In method ImageAssetManager.bitmapForId, if BitmapFactory.decodeStream returned null, so NPE crash happened. And we can see this is a legal return value in android docs, So I fixed it.

issue.title: Fix ImageAssetManager.bitmapForId NPE crash
issue.body: In method ImageAssetManager.bitmapForId, if BitmapFactory.decodeStream returned null, so NPE crash happened. And we can see this is a legal return value in android docs, So I fixed it.
